short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Delete, Archive, Report Spam Buttons in GMail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension Hides Delete, Archive and Report Spam Buttons in GMail, so users cannot delete the email.
You can install this extension using Group Policy Editor in Windows or similar in Mac to prevent users from disabling it, if you want:https://www.chromium.org/administrators/policy-list-3#ExtensionInstallForcelist

Command to add is :
bbigelbabboeplhjojgkehnhapnnimcg;https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx
Then users can neither disable this extension
